Stijn van Cuijk

This is the personal website of Stijn van Cuijk. A designer currently studying Industrial Product Design at the HAN. Stijn likes to practice his design approach in many different fields. The main focus lays on the process and a way of thinking. Everything can be designed.

Arnhem, Netherlands
